Piratini, December 9, 1838. Illustrious Sir,

I acknowledge receipt of your letter dated the 3rd of this month and in response to the same, I inform you that tomorrow the required orders will be issued.

God keep Your Lordship.

Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, December 9, 1838.  
Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
Domingos José de Almeida
